map_layers.title: Property Size
map_layers.description: Total interior floor space in square feet between the outside surfaces of a building’s enclosing walls. This includes tenant space, common areas, stairwells, basements, storage, and interior parking.

map_layers.title: Neighborhood
map_layers.description: The Community Area where the property is located. There are 77 Community Areas defined by the City of Chicago.

map_layers.title: Year Built
map_layers.description: Year in which a property was constructed or underwent a complete renovation.

map_layers.title: Number of Buildings
map_layers.description: Number of buildings included in the property's report. In cases where a property is reporting as a campus, multiple buildings may be included in one report.

map_layers.title: Electricity Use
map_layers.description: The annual amount of electricity consumed by the property on-site, including electricity purchased from the grid and generated by onsite renewable systems, measured in kBTUs.

map_layers.title: Natural Gas Use
map_layers.description: The annual amount of utility-supplied natural gas consumed by the property in a metric year, measured in kBTUs.

map_layers.title: District Steam Use
map_layers.description: The annual amount of district steam consumed by the property on-site,  measured in kBTUs.

map_layers.title: District Chilled Water Use
map_layers.description: The annual amount of district chilled water consumed by the property on-site,  measured in kBTUs.

map_layers.title: All Other Fuel Use
map_layers.description: The annual amount of fuel use other than electricity, natural gas, district chilled water, or district steam consumed by the property on-site,  measured in kBTUs.

map_layers.title: ENERGY STAR Score
map_layers.description: 1-100 rating that assesses a property’s overall energy performance, based on national data to control for climate, building uses, and operations. A score of 50 represents the national median.

map_layers.title: Site Energy Use Intensity
map_layers.description: Site Energy Use divided by the property's gross floor area, in kBTU/ft². Site Energy Use is the annual amount of all the energy consumed by the property on-site, as reported on utility bills.

map_layers.title: Source Energy Use Intensity
map_layers.description: Source Energy Use divided by the property's gross floor area, in kBTU/ft². Source Energy Use is the annual energy required to operate the property, including losses from energy generation, transmission, and distribution.

map_layers.title: Total GHG Emissions
map_layers.description: The total amount of greenhouse gas emissions, including CO₂, CH₄, and N₂O gases released into the atmosphere as a result of energy consumption at the property, in metric tons of CO₂ equivalent.

map_layers.title: GHG Intensity
map_layers.description: Total Greenhouse Gas Emissions divided by property's gross floor area, measured in kilograms of carbon dioxide equivalent per square foot.
